sqls.sql: select super_id, user_tag, top, tag_dimension,sum(a.tag_rank) as tag_rank from trec_user_tags a where 1=1 <#if super_id??> and super_id='$!super_id!$' </#if> <#if user_tag??> and user_tag='$!user_tag!$' </#if> <#if top??> and top=$!top!$ </#if> <#if dimension??> and tag_dimension='$!dimension!$' </#if> <#if tag_source??> and tag_source='$!tag_source!$' </#if> group by super_id, user_tag, top, tag_dimension <#if order_by??> order by $!order_by!$ </#if> limit $!start_row0!$,$!page_size!$
